sentences.en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentences.cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.en: 9 percent interest less 7 percent inflation equals 2 percent.
sentences.cn: 9%的利息减去7%的通货膨胀率等于2%。

sentences.en: A 10 percent service charge is added in lieu of tipping.
sentences.cn: 加收了10%的服务费以代替小费。

sentences.en: A 10 to 15 percent deviation is considered acceptable.
sentences.cn: 10%至15%的离差是可以接受的。

sentences.en: Almost 80 percent of the state's residents were born elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 该州居民中几乎有80%出生在异地。

sentences.en: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.cn: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.en: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.cn: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

sentences.en: George W. Bush carried the state with 56 percent of the vote.
sentences.cn: 乔治·W.布什在该州以56%的得票率获胜。

sentences.en: He only got a plurality on November 3rd, just 49 percent.
sentences.cn: 他在11月3号的选举中仅获得了49%的相对多数票。

sentences.en: I agree with you a hundred percent.
sentences.cn: 我百分之百同意你的看法。

sentences.en: I agree with you one hundred percent.
sentences.cn: 我百分之百地同意你的意见。

sentences.en: In 1987, McDonald's captured 19 percent of all fast-food sales.
sentences.cn: 1987年，麦当劳占据了整个快餐业销售额的19%。

sentences.en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentences.cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentences.en: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.cn: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentences.en: Only 18 percent of those surveyed opposed the idea.
sentences.cn: 被调查者中只有18%的人反对该主张。

sentences.en: Poor families spend about 80 to 90 percent of their income on food.
sentences.cn: 贫困家庭大约花费收入的80%到90%购买食物。

sentences.en: The number of families seeking shelter rose by 17 percent.
sentences.cn: 寻求避难的家庭户增加了17％。

sentences.en: The number of queues repaired out of the percent detected.
sentences.cn: 修复的队列数目超过检测到的百分比。

sentences.en: The rate of inflation is running at about 2.7 percent.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀率大约为2.7%。

sentences.en: There one percent of the people own more than fifty percent of the wealth.
sentences.cn: 在那里，百分之一的人却拥有百分之五十以上的财富。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.
sentences.cn: 28%的联邦预算用于国防。

sentences.en: Violent crime has increased by 10 percent since last year.
sentences.cn: 暴力犯罪自去年以来增加了10%。

sentences.en: What percent of the population is/are overweight?
sentences.cn: 体重超重的人占人口多大的百分比？

words.tran_cn: 百分率的；按百等分排列的
[数]百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

phrases.tran_cn: 容积百分数，容量百分比；体积百分比
